Original_Text: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Researchers unveiled a new AI model capable of predicting protein structures with unprecedented accuracy, potentially accelerating drug discovery.
LONDON (AP) - British scientists discovered a new species of fish in the Pacific Ocean, raising questions about marine biodiversity in warming waters.
SYDNEY (AFP) - Australia’s cricket team secured a thrilling victory in the Ashes, with a last-minute boundary sealing a 3-2 series win over England.
BAGHDAD (Reuters) - A roadside bomb detonated in the capital, injuring five civilians and escalating tensions ahead of national elections.
TOKYO (Reuters) - Engineers developed a lightweight solar panel that doubles efficiency, offering hope for scalable renewable energy solutions.
PARIS (AP) - France’s soccer squad advanced to the World Cup semifinals after a penalty shootout victory against Brazil in a tense match.
NAIROBI (AFP) - Clashes between rival factions in the region displaced hundreds of families, prompting urgent calls for humanitarian aid.
BOSTON (Reuters) - A new algorithm improved weather forecasting models, reducing errors in predicting hurricane paths by 20 percent.
MELBOURNE (AP) - A marathon runner broke the national record, finishing the race in under two hours and ten minutes, stunning spectators.
KABUL (Reuters) - Peace talks faltered as negotiators failed to agree on a ceasefire, raising fears of renewed violence in the region.
